document_data.name: "Tress"
document_data.mainbody: '''"Tress"''' (given name unknown) was the owner of the [[Dragonriders Club]] in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Tall and urbane, when at work, Tress dressed in leathers that resembled a dragon costume. After the Open Feast, she painted sinuous [[dragon]]s on her cleavage that became visible when she leaned.
document_data.Personality: She was sympathetic to fellow servants.
document_data.Abilities: Tress was uncanny in her abilities to know who was who.
document_data.Possessions: Tress kept a [[chapbook]] by [[Flarm]] about an event from the {{yearlinkName|1478}}, which she lent to [[Amarune Whitewave]], one of her dancers, in preparation for the Open Feast.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|65|6}}
document_data.Activities: Though not a dancer, she was in charge of the Dragonriders Club.
document_data.Relationships: Although she was more properly called "mistress", not even the Watch called her anything other than "Tress".{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|72}} and their health.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|140|13}}
